name: #ExquisiteGame
description:
#ExquisiteGame was a TTRPG design challenge facilitated by John R. Harness (twitter/ itch) in Spring 2018. Designers created "expansions" to a non-existent, never-released sci-fi rpg. Surrealist games, as well as Vast & Starlit and its expansions by Epidiah Ravachol, inspired the project.

"Expansions" for #ExquisiteGame:

  • 5*00*00 by Epidiah Ravachol
  • Ansible Beacon by Nora Blake
  • Cute Fishing by Taylor LaBresh
  • Frantic Gambling by Adira Slattery
  • guardians by aura belle
  • Home and Beyond by Melody Watson
  • Origami Samurai by Richard Kreutz-Landry
  • Rail Goblins by Aaron King
  • Ritual by Lucian Kahn
  • Tender Greeting by Tyler Beckett
  • The Pool by Rick Dean
  • Unmoored Funeral by Jess Leigh Unrein

The .zip file also includes the original pitch document as well as "Exquisite Core," which John R. Harness designed after the expansions were submitted.
